task.title: Crafting Steps
task.shortdesc: How to use different orbs and change the item affixes.

prereq.p: Items used for crafting must be identified and non-corrupted. Increasing the item's quality is optional, but the higher quality improves the chances to obtain better modifier values.

step.cmd: Put the item in your inventory.
Optional for armors: Use Armourer's scrap on an armor to increase the quality to 20% (max %).
Optional for weapons: Use Blacksmit's Whetstone on a weapon to increase the quality to 20% (max %).
Use the appropriate type of Orb according to the desired outcome.
Right-click an orb to mark it for use.
Left-click the item to apply the orb.

taskbody.example: Example: Use Orb of Transmutation to upgrade the item's rarity from Normal to Magic. Keep applying Orbs of Alteration until receiving the desired outcome, for example 12% Increased Intelligence. Finish the crafting by using a Regal Orb to upgrade the item to Rare. It will keep the Magic version affixes and will add at least one more random modifier to the item.
